achievements.label: Apiarian Court
achievements.descriptionLocked: I dedicated myself to the nectar of life.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I dedicated myself to the nectar of life.

achievements.label: Botanists' Envy
achievements.descriptionLocked: My collection is as extensive as it ever will be.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: My collection is as extensive as it ever will be.

achievements.label: Organized Catalogue
achievements.descriptionLocked: I've unlocked secrets from every corner of botany.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: I've unlocked secrets from every corner of botany.

achievements.label: Rotten Mulch
achievements.descriptionLocked: The Mare took me in her arms, and I was joined with the earth.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: The Mare took me in her arms, and I was joined with the earth.

achievements.label: The Succulent Garden
achievements.descriptionLocked: The Ring-Yew bore me fruit. My cycle of life will never end.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: The Ring-Yew bore me fruit. My cycle of life will never end.

achievements.label: The Blissful Orchard
achievements.descriptionLocked: The Applebright nourished my desires to their malignant fruition.
achievements.descriptionUnlocked: The Applebright nourished my desires to their malignant fruition.
